did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: School of Hotel Administration. Center for Hospitality Research records, 2003-2012.

origination.label: Creator:

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes reports, publications, and white papers pertaining to the hospitality industry.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes reports, publications, and white papers pertaining to the hospitality industry.

The Center for Hospitality Research (CHR) is the source for research on and for the hospitality industry. Center Fellows work with business leaders to develop new ideas, theories, and models that improve strategic, managerial, and operating practices. These insights are captured in research reports and industry tools that are available online.
